DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is estimate how sexual function in endometrial cancer survivors varies with severity of disease.
DOC.criteria: History of Stage IIIIA endometrial adenocarcinoma of any grade 15 years out from primary surgical treatment Adjuvant therapy may only have consisted of radiation or hormonal therapy No evidence of disease Previous treatment for other malignancies Did not undergo surgery for primary treatment of endometrial cancer Inability to read, write and speak fluent English Major cognitive impairment affecting ability to provide consent
